ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices

Class GameConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices.GameConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDevice, ISensor

    public class GameConsole
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISensor
    Feed Throttle, Rudder, Aleron and Elevator from a Game Console to the ParameterStore. We also process the Buttons to control the Flight Modes.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
